subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Maxim Afinogenov scored with 2 minutes 17 seconds left in the third period, just as Buffalo’s sixth power play ended, and Ryan Miller made 42 saves to lift the Sabres to a 2-1 victory over the host Islanders on Wednesday night.
snippet: Maxim Afinogenov scored with 2 minutes 17 seconds left in the third period, just as Buffalo’s sixth power play ended, and Ryan Miller made 42 saves to lift the Sabres to a 2-1 victory over the host Islanders on Wednesday night.
